14  string Server::status_string[] = {"IDLE",
15  "READY",
16  "EXECUTING",
17  "RELEASING",

19 
20  Server::Server(const string &name, const string &s) :
21  Entity(name),
22  arr(0),
23  last_arr(0),
24  status(IDLE),
25  dline(0),
26  abs_dline(0),
27  tasks(),
28  last_exec_time(0),
29  kernel(0),
30  sched_(0),
31  currExe_(0),
32  _bandExEvt(Event::_DEFAULT_PRIORITY + 4),
33  _dlineMissEvt(Event::_DEFAULT_PRIORITY + 6),
34  _rechargingEvt(Event::_DEFAULT_PRIORITY - 1),
35  _dispatchEvt(Event::_DEFAULT_PRIORITY + 5)
36  {
37  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
38  string s_name = parse_util::get_token(s);
39  // only for passing to the factory
40  vector<string> p = parse_util::split_param(parse_util::get_param(s));
41  // create the scheduler
42 
43  DBGPRINT_2("SCHEDULER: ", s_name);
44  DBGPRINT("PARAMETERS: ");
45  for (int i=0; i<p.size(); ++i) DBGPRINT(p[i]);
46 
47  auto_ptr<Scheduler> curr = FACT(Scheduler).create(s_name, p);
48  sched_ = curr.release();
49  if (!sched_) throw ParseExc("Server::Server()", s);
50 
51  sched_->setKernel(this);
52 
53  // register all event handlers
54  register_handler(_bandExEvt, this, &Server::onBudgetExhausted);
55  register_handler(_dlineMissEvt, this, &Server::onDlineMiss);
56  register_handler(_rechargingEvt, this, &Server::onRecharging);
57  register_handler(_schedEvt, this, &Server::onSched);
58  register_handler(_deschedEvt, this, &Server::onDesched);
59  register_handler(_dispatchEvt, this, &Server::onDispatch);
60  }
61 
62  Server::~Server()
63  {
64  delete sched_;
65  }
66 
67  void Server::addTask(AbsRTTask &task, const string &params)
68  {
69  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
70  task.setKernel(this);
71  tasks.push_back(&task);
72  DBGPRINT_2("Calling sched->addTask, with params = ", params);
73  sched_->addTask(&task, params);
74  }

76  // Task interface
77  void Server::schedule()
78  {
79  _schedEvt.process();
80  }
81 
82  void Server::deschedule()
83  {
84  _deschedEvt.process();
85  }

112  void Server::activate(AbsRTTask *task)
113  {
114  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
115 
116  sched_->insert(task);
117  }
118 
119  void Server::suspend(AbsRTTask *task)
120  {
121  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
122  sched_->extract(task);
123 
124  if (getProcessor(task) != NULL) {
125  task->deschedule();
126  currExe_ = NULL;
127  sched_->notify(NULL);
128  }
129  }
130 
131  void Server::dispatch()
132  {
133  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
134  _dispatchEvt.drop();
135  _dispatchEvt.post(SIMUL.getTime());
136  }
137 
138  CPU *Server::getProcessor(const AbsRTTask *) const
139  {
140  return kernel->getProcessor(this);
141  }
142 
143  CPU *Server::getOldProcessor(const AbsRTTask *) const
144  {
145  return kernel->getOldProcessor(this);
146  }
147 
148  void Server::onArrival(AbsRTTask *t)
149  {
150  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
151 
152  sched_->insert(t);
153 
154  if (status == IDLE) {
155  idle_ready();
156  kernel->onArrival(this);
157  }
158  else if (status == EXECUTING) {
159  dispatch();
160  }
161  else if (status == RELEASING) {
162  releasing_ready();
163  kernel->onArrival(this);
164  }
165  else if (status == RECHARGING || status == RELEASING) {
166  DBGPRINT("Server is RECHARGING or READY, waiting");
167  }
168  }
169 
170  void Server::onEnd(AbsRTTask *t)
171  {
172  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
173 
174  assert(status == EXECUTING);
175  sched_->extract(t);
176 
177  currExe_ = NULL;
178 
179  sched_->notify(NULL); // round robin case
180 
181  dispatch();
182  }
183 
184  void Server::onBudgetExhausted(Event *)
185  {
186  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
187 
188  assert(status == EXECUTING);
189 
190  _dispatchEvt.drop();
191 
192  if(currExe_ != NULL){
193  currExe_->deschedule();
194  currExe_ = NULL;
195  }
196 
197  kernel->suspend(this);
198  sched_->notify(NULL);
199  kernel->dispatch();
200 
201  executing_recharging();
202 
203  if (status == READY) kernel->onArrival(this);
204  }
205 
206 
207  void Server::onSched(Event *)
208  {
209  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
210 
211  assert(status == READY);
212 
213  ready_executing();
214  dispatch();
215  }
216 
217  void Server::onDesched(Event *)
218  {
219  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
220 
221  // I cannot assume it is still executing, maybe it is already
222  // in recharging status (bacause of previous onEnd(task))
223  if (status == EXECUTING) {
224  executing_ready();
225 
226  // signal the task
227  currExe_->deschedule();
228  currExe_ = NULL;
229  sched_->notify(NULL);
230  }
231  }
232 
233  void Server::onDlineMiss(Event *)
234  {
235  }
236 
237  void Server::onRecharging(Event *)
238  {
239  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
240 
241  assert(status == RECHARGING);
242 
243  if (sched_->getFirst() != NULL) {
244  recharging_ready();
245  kernel->onArrival(this);
246  }
247  else {
248  recharging_idle();
249  currExe_ = NULL;
250  sched_->notify(NULL);
251  }
252  }
253 
254  void Server::newRun()
255  {
256  arr = 0;
257  last_arr=0;
258  status = IDLE;
259  dline = 0;
260  abs_dline = 0;
261  last_exec_time = 0;
262  _bandExEvt.drop();
263  _dlineMissEvt.drop();
264  _rechargingEvt.drop();
265 
266  _schedEvt.drop();
267  _deschedEvt.drop();
268  _dispatchEvt.drop();
269  currExe_ = NULL;
270 
271  }
272 
273  void Server::endRun()
274  {
275  }
276 
277  void Server::onDispatch(Event *e)
278  {
279  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
280 
281  AbsRTTask *newExe = sched_->getFirst();
282 
283  DBGPRINT("Current situation");
284  DBGPRINT_2("newExe: ", taskname(newExe));
285  DBGPRINT_2("currExe_: ", taskname(currExe_));
286 
287  if (newExe != currExe_) {
288  if (currExe_ != NULL) currExe_->deschedule();
289  currExe_ = newExe;
290  if (newExe != NULL) newExe->schedule();
291  //sched_->notify(newExe);
292  }
293 
294  DBGPRINT_2("Now Running: ", taskname(newExe));
295 
296  if (currExe_ == NULL) {
297  sched_->notify(NULL);
298  executing_releasing();
299  kernel->suspend(this);
300  kernel->dispatch();
301  }
302  }
303 
304 }
